title: Kym Marsh films Coronation Street wedding scene in veil, dress
text:

Actress Kym Marsh gets set to film a Corrie wedding scene in white dress, veil... and dark blue trainers!

Kym plays TV’s Michelle Connor, who is due to get hitched at long last to fiancé Robert Preston.

But nothing’s straightforward, of course. Not least because Robert, played by Tristan Gemmill, has a secret lover who is pregnant.

Michelle’s ex-hubby Steve McDonald (actor Simon Gregson) is among the guests... naturally.

And her two boys – biological son Ali and mix-up-at-birth son Ryan – are there too.

(Image: MCPIX)

(Image: MCPIX)

Plus more Connors in the shape of Carla and Maria, played by Alison King and Samia Longchambon.

Kym, 43, who had a breast enhancement in 2014, wore the trainers before donning white shoes for the upcoming TV scenes. Fans know she and Tristan, 52, are leaving.

But will they sail off into the sunset together... or will Kym pop those trainers back on and do a runner?

(Image: MCPIX)

(Image: ZENPIX LTD)

It comes after reports that Robert will be arrested for killing his secret other fiancée Vicky.

The chef has been secretly seeing Vicky behind Michelle's back.

But things are set to come to an explosive end when Michelle discovers what Robert has really been up to.

(Image: MCPIX)

(Image: MCPIX)

And The Sun have claimed that things continue in a downward spiral when Vicky ends up going missing and Robert is questioned by police, who suspect he may have murdered her.

A source told the publication: "Robert is going to be hauled in by police after Vicky goes missing.

"They think he's killed her after he disappears on the night she did and then returns to Weatherfield with a face full of scratches."

(Image: MCPIX)

(Image: ZENPIX LTD)

The insider said that shocking scenes see Vicky confronting Robert over his lies and she completely loses it.

This, they claim, will be the last time that viewers see her.

"Michelle is suspicious too because she realises the night Vicky went missing is the same night Robert mysteriously went out in the middle of the night," they added.

(Image: MCPIX)

*Coronation Street returns Wednesday at 7.30pm and 8.30pm on ITV
description: Corrie's Michelle Connor will get hitched to Robert Preston - but nothing is ever simple on the street
